channel.title: Server Status
channel.description:
Yesterday i have add my server on server status + they give me username and password to log in my server...i did that. today when check my server status it say [s]This server does not exist.[/s]. i has been running server for 1 day and still saying [s]This server does not exist.[/s]
Im using Sing tel modern (Singapore), last time i run server and put my server in mopar status it took like 15-30 min till my server shown..
right now i wait for 1 day still not approve.

item.title: Server Status
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:1, topic:275446”]Q: Your page shows my server as offline, when it is actually online because me and my friends are on it.

       A: Just because your server is online for you or your friends, doesn't mean it is online for my server or others.  There could be network congestion between our two servers, or even a break in the internet that hasn't been routed around yet.  Also my script must check sometimes 1000+ servers every 30 minutes, so it can't spend valuable time waiting for a response from you, if you don't respond in the given time it marks you as offline.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status
item.dc:creator: @whip_of_soulz whip of soulz
item.description:
@whip_of_soulz wrote:

Same thing happend to me ever since I moved to a VPS kinda anoying because nobody can play my cool delta server.

Read full topic

Re-register the server if it will let you.
